name: Don't Fund Me - LudumDare44
description:
Don't Fund Me is a game about collecting as little money as possible in order to not fund the evil cause of pineapple pizza.

Objective:

Avoid touching enemies as they will be collected. Once you reach £5 you lose. 

Survive for 90 Seconds and you win.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Shift - Sprint
